Text:
â€”And that wraps up the status of this year's
Halloween.

Within the private office of the Shadow Garden,
Alpha listens to Gamma's report and nods with
a satisfied expression.

I'm pleased to hear that it's been a tremendous
success. The Halloween event he suggested has
taken firm root in Midgar Kingdom.

Certainly. Mitsugoshi's branches have also achieved
impressive sales figures and established a solid
reputation.
Well then, what's with the long face?

...Huh? Oh, my apologies. It seems my emotions got
the best of me, and I've let them show...
What happened?

Actually...this year's Halloween has been even more
successful than anticipated, so we're currently
mobilizing all of our staff to handle the situation.

To be honest, it's been so well-received that we're
experiencing a shortage of staff for our pop-up
stores and branches...

I see. So we're already understaffed even at
this stage...

Yes. We're hastily making arrangements to provide
training for several individuals, including those
from the Garden's Numbers who seem promising,
with plans to dispatch them to different branches.

However, we've already received personnel requests
from our pop-up stores that can't wait until the
training is completed...
Is there really nobody available? No one at all?
Umm...
Gamma?
...Delta and Eta are still on hand.

Alpha prompts Gamma to continue her sentence, but she
freezes upon hearing the names she mentions.

(If we send those two, it could potentially increase
the workload at the store...)
Um...Lady Alpha?

Desperate times call for desperate measures. We need
to fill the personnel shortage.
*gasp* You mean...?!

Let's dispatch the two for a limited time and assign
them to specific, straightforward tasks until the
others have completed their training.
What?! Y-You can't be serious!
I am. We currently have no other option.

Alpha leans forward, rests her elbows on the table,
and instructs Gamma to summon the two.

Once Delta and Eta are summoned, Alpha proceeds to
explain the situation to them using clear and simple
language.

I have a single task to assign to both of you. Go to
the pop-up stores and give out sweets to the
children as part of the event.
Why do we have to give out candy?

It's not just about clearing excess inventory.
The goal is to boost sales at the main store
by giving out candy at the pop-up venues.
Boost...sales... Um, wha...?
Eta, you understand, right?

...The strategy is to lure customers with candy
samples...
What a relief. Yes, it seems you get the picture.
But...I can't stand...crowds...

Whether or not you can stand it, you have to do it.
You'll give sweets to children who say the words,
"Trick or Treat!"
Tri...ck?

Trick or treat. It means, "Give us candy, or we'll
play tricks on you."

What?! Only naughty children threaten others like
that! I'll take 'em all out!
Don't be silly! That's the way Halloween works.

Your job is to promote us to the children and their
guardians...creating opportunities for them to shop
at Mitsugoshi for future Halloweens.

So you must under no circumstances "take them all
out"!
Listening to you makes my head hurt, Gamma.
Whaâ€”?!
I can't stand...mobs of children...
Ugh! Eta!

Gamma turns away from Delta and Eta, facing Alpha
with a look of desperation.

Lady Alpha, sending these two to handle the job is
pointless... We should wait until the others finish
their training!

Grr... I may not get what you're saying, Gamma,
but I won't stand being made fun of by you!

Hm... If we don't have to go...then I agree with
Gamma...

We can't include anyone who lacks comprehension or
motivation as part of the workforce!
Quiet, all of you.

Alpha raises her hand to silence them, and all three
stop talking and freeze in their tracks.

Gamma, beggars can't be choosers. You underestimated
the situation and didn't make adequate preparations,
correct?

Y-Yes... My lenient judgment is largely responsible
for our current predicament...

Delta, your task is simple. Give sweets to children
as part of the pop-up store event.
Ha-ruff... I-I can do that...

Eta, take a moment to carefully consider the source
of your research funds. Now, answer me: Can I entrust
you with this job?
...And if I refuse?
You know what will happen, don't you?

My research funds will be reduced... Ack...
Understood...

After hearing the responses from the three, Alpha's
expression softens, and she claps her hands together.

I'm glad we've come to an agreement. Delta, Eta, head
to your destinations immediately.
Y-Yeah. Okay!
...Copy that.
Lady Alpha?

...I'd like to believe everything will be fine, but
Gamma, please ensure the others complete their
training as soon as possible.
Understood.

(I just hope pressuring them into this decision
wasn't a mistake...)

As Delta and Eta exit the room, Alpha gazes at the
door with a concerned expression on her face and
lets out a deep sigh.
